Package ohos.global.resource.solidxml

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.global.resource.solidxml.Node

  • public abstract class Node
extends Object
    Describes a node in a solid XML document.

    Node instances can be obtained only using the SolidXml#getRoot(), getChild(), or getSibling() method.

    Since:
    1
    See Also:
    SolidXml, Attribute

        public abstract Node getChild​()
        Obtains the root node of a node.

        Returns the root node of the node; returns null if there is not such a node.

      • getTypedAttribute

        @Deprecated
public abstract List<TypedAttribute> getTypedAttribute​(ResourceManager resManager)
        Deprecated. See getTypedAttributes().
        Obtains the typed attribute set of a node.
        Parameters:
        resManager - Indicates the ResourceManager used to obtain the TypedAttribute instance.
        Returns:
        Returns the typed attribute set of the node; returns null if there are no typed attributes.
        Since:
        3

      • getTypedAttributes

        public abstract List<TypedAttribute> getTypedAttributes​(ResourceManager resManager)
        Obtains the typed attribute set of a node.
        Parameters:
        resManager - Indicates the ResourceManager used to obtain the TypedAttribute instance.
        Returns:
        Returns the typed attribute set of the node; returns null if there are no typed attributes.
        Since:
        4

      • getTypedAttributes

        public abstract List<TypedAttribute> getTypedAttributes​(Pattern defaultPattern)
        Obtains the set of node and defaultPattern attributes. The node attributes overwrite the defaultPattern attributes with the same name.
        Parameters:
        defaultPattern - Indicates the defaultPattern instance to form the attribute set.
        Returns:
        Returns the attribute set if obtained; returns an empty list if no attributes are obtained.
        Since:
        4

      • getTypedAttributes

        public abstract List<TypedAttribute> getTypedAttributes​(Pattern defaultPattern,
                                                        String[] selected)
        Obtains attributes of selected names from the set of node and defaultPattern attributes. The node attributes overwrite the defaultPattern attributes with the same name.
        Parameters:
        defaultPattern - Indicates the defaultPattern instance in the attribute set.
        selected - Indicates the set of selected attribute names.
        Returns:
        Returns the selected attributes if obtained from the attribute set; returns an empty list if no selected attributes are found.
        Since:
        4
